title:
ASUS ROG announces new AMD Ryzen 8000 series powered gaming laptops in 
Malaysia
text: February 29, 2024 January 26, 2024 January 4, 2024 December 27, 2023 October 24, 2023 March 29, 2024 March 26, 2024 March 22, 2024 March 21, 2024 March 19, 2024 March 29, 2024 March 14, 2024 March 5, 2024 February 23, 2024 March 5, 2024 November 29, 2023 October 31, 2023 October 18, 2023 February 21, 2024 February 8, 2024 January 29, 2024 January 23, 2024 March 29, 2024 February 21, 2024 January 8, 2024 January 8, 2024 March 14, 2024 February 23, 2024 January 23, 2024 October 30, 2023 March 8, 2024 February 7, 2024 January 18, 2024 January 18, 2024 December 5, 2023 November 9, 2023 August 22, 2023 April 26, 2023 August 8, 2023 January 9, 2023 June 16, 2022 March 24, 2022 February 7, 2024 October 30, 2023 September 19, 2023 March 3, 2023 June 30, 2023 March 14, 2022 November 4, 2021 November 3, 2021 September 20, 2023 August 9, 2023 January 19, 2023 March 30, 2022 March 8, 2024 January 18, 2024 January 18, 2024 January 9, 2024 March 29, 2024 March 26, 2024 March 19, 2024 February 29, 2024 February 29, 2024 February 21, 2024 January 23, 2024 January 15, 2024 November 22, 2023 October 26, 2023 August 3, 2023 June 28, 2023 March 26, 2024 January 15, 2024 December 27, 2023 November 2, 2023 December 18, 2023 October 20, 2023 October 12, 2023 May 30, 2023 August 29, 2023 July 3, 2023 June 15, 2023 January 19, 2023 March 29, 2024 October 10, 2023 September 5, 2023 May 25, 2023 January 18, 2024 September 13, 2023 September 13, 2023 August 14, 2023 ASUS Republic of Gamers (ROG) Malaysia has officially launched its highly anticipated 2024 AMD Gaming laptop series, bringing cutting-edge performance and innovation to the local gaming community. The series includes the latest ROG Zephyrus G14 and ASUS TUF Gaming A15 models, both powered by the new AMD Ryzen 8000 Series processors. Like Intel’s Meteor Lake processors, the Ryzen 8000 Series processors come with AMD Ryzen AI technology, it enhances productivity tools for Windows Studio effects, such as automatic framing, eye-contact correction, and advanced background effects in video calls, ensuring a seamless and efficient user experience.  The ROG Zephyrus G14 (2024) has undergone a comprehensive redesign, featuring an all-aluminum CNC-machined chassis that strikes a perfect balance between weight reduction and structural rigidity. The redesign also makes room for an edge-to-edge keyboard and significantly larger speakers that deliver unparalleled audio quality with deep bass down to 100 Hz. With a fresh Platinum White colorway and a new Slash Lighting LED array on the lid, the Zephyrus G14 stands out with its custom patterns and animations, setting a new standard for aesthetics in gaming laptops.  The ASUS TUF Gaming A15 continues to evolve, now featuring the latest AMD Ryzen 8000 series processors, DDR5-5600MHz RAM, and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40-Series Laptop GPU with NVIDIA Advanced Optimus for peak performance. Known for its rugged durability, the TUF Gaming A15 offers expandable memory and storage slots.  Its display boasts a 2.5K resolution with a refresh rate of up to 165 Hz, G-SYNC® support, and an IPS level panel for accurate colors, complemented by Dolby Atmos® and Hi-Res Audio for an immersive gaming experience. The ROG Zephyrus G14 (2024) is available in two variants: the RTX 4060 GPU version with 32GB RAM and 1TB PCIe 4.0 storage for RM 8,999, and the RTX 4050 GPU version with 16GB RAM and 1TB PCIe 4.0 storage for RM 7,999. Both models, equipped with the AMD Ryzen™ 9 8945HS Processor, are available starting today. The TUF Gaming A15 will also be available in multiple configurations, with prices ranging from RM 6,499 for the RTX 4060 GPU version to RM 6,999 for the RTX 4070 GPU version, all equipped with the AMD Ryzen™ 9 8945H Processor and set to hit shelves in mid-February 2024. The geeky dictator of KLGG. 2024. KLGadget Creative Media Sdn Bhd. All Rights Reserved.
